location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Newnham, Acting Chief Secretary to the Government, Public Department, Bombay to Captain William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing an extract of a letter from James Bruce Simson, Acting Secretary to the Medical Board. The Resident is therefore informed that Assistant Surgeon Dows will remain in charge of the medical duties for the 1st Battalion, 3rd Regiment until a relief medical officer can be placed with the regiment. As a result, he will be delayed in taking up his appointment at the Bushire Residency.
